locale.message: Allowed Uploads plugin enables to choose the filetypes that are allowed when submitting a manuscript. NOTE! This is not a security plugin! Please make sure that the files directory is outside the web root.
Only the following file extensions are allowed: {$allowedExtensions}.
Add a semicolon separated list of allowed file extensions. For example doc; docx; pdf; gif; jpg and click OK.
